name: Cubic Rhythms
description:
You play as a crunking, twerking, hip-poppin cube who dances their way around, with only a single purpose in mind, to best as many raving cubes as possible and become an angel. Where will your journey take you?

Keep the beat while avoiding bumping into others. Collect juice from surrendered foes.  Build up a flow and soar to new heights!

Made for SA Game Jam 2018
Requires: Keyboard and mouse
WASD -> Dash
Mouse -> Aim
LMB -> Fire
